name: John M. Bjørndalen
content: Bjørndalen, John Markus | UiT John.markus.bjorndalen – Institutt for informatikk | UiT Gå til hovedinnhold Enheten Ansatte John Markus Bjørndalen Foto: UiT Professor Institutt for informatikk john.markus.bjorndalen@uit.no +4777645252 90148307 Tromsø Her finner du meg John Markus Bjørndalen Om Forskning og undervisning Her finner du meg Arbeider i Cristin Vitenskapelige artikler og bokkapitler Andre Andreas Berntsen Løvland, Helge Fredriksen, John Markus Bjørndalen : Predicting the destination port of fishing vessels utilizing transformers Maritime Transport Research 2025 DOI / ARKIV Steffen Ole Randrup Kristensen, John Markus Bjørndalen, Issam Rais, Hoai Phuong Ha, Otto Johan Anshus : Weather-aware Wake-up of Sleeping Cyber-Physical IoT Nodes 2023 DOI / ARKIV Lukasz Sergiusz Michalik, Loic Guegan, Issam Rais, Otto Johan Anshus, John Markus Bjørndalen : LoRaLitE: LoRa protocol for Energy-Limited environments 2022 DOI Roberth Tollefsen, Issam Rais, John Markus Bjørndalen, Hoai Phuong Ha, Otto Anshus : Distribution of Updates to IoT Nodes in a Resource-Challenged Environment 2021 DOI Steffen Ole Randrup Kristensen, Issam Rais, John Markus Bjørndalen, Hoai Phuong Ha, Otto Johan Anshus : Impact of image compression on CNN performance metrics for CPS nodes at the Arctic Tundra 2021 Michael J.
